Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the United States is the only system of federalism in the world.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide evidence or examples to back up the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the United States is the only country with a federalist system without considering the political systems of other countries.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or examples of federalist systems in other countries that contradict the claim.
